attributes.title: Ugliest and one of the stupidest presidents in US history
attributes.review: Hi apple, this app is useless. Completely useless. If I could rate this a zero I would. He’s a complete idiot with the mindset of a two year old. Actually, a two year old is smarter than this guy.

attributes.title: Trying to get rid of TikTok
attributes.review: Why that’s were all the kids our that’s why keeps them happy this is some bull why our trying to make everything worse

attributes.title: Don’t download!😹✨
attributes.review: It’s horrible😋it took 5 day to download😹it gave my phone 5 virus worms😛I had to get a new phone and iCloud❤️the trumpet worms came back👹the ate my dog and my house😊I have no house and I’m in serious debt😜 please don’t click download✨🧚🏽

attributes.title: It’s not funny?
attributes.review:
The jokes aren’t even that good! Even J.K. Rowling can write better than these yahoos! I didn’t laugh ONCE while using this app! And the games are terrible! I play the games and my phone gets rigged by Russia! 

Maybe hire someone funnier next time 🥵🥵🥴🥴🍍🍍🌞🌞🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🧚🧚💓💓😈😈

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: this app doesn’t even look like how the pictures are. It’s just a black screen with a small orange in the middle of the screen. I was completely SHOCKED and I felt lied to. This app is completely useless.

attributes.title: It killed my cat 😰and I’m also dead
attributes.review: I soon as I download this app I heard a sound and my cat was dead I would not recommend this app it can kill pets and siblings 🟠and worst of all it can make your house go on fire worst app ever smh

attributes.title: Shut it down!
attributes.review: This app was the most horrible thing that has ever happened to me. Once I downloaded this app my phone entirely shut down and started playing dance monkey on full blast.

attributes.title: What a waste of time
attributes.review: I was expecting for this app to work smoothly but experienced the opposite. Work on fixing it! Several glitches, slow to open, the list goes on

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Terrible app I felt as if I was being controlled on my social by just using and the fact that this man is banning TikTok to think ppl are spying on us the government is already spying on us and no that’s still not ok make it make sense.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded it to help me with a debate so I could have facts to back me up but there was nothing on there that I could use. Also the branding is branding that not even an amateur would use
